descriptionHtml:
A massive overhaul re-texture and re-colour for Altair, using master robes.

I had forgotten to upload the mesh with this file, so it isn\'t standalone...YET. But until I do you guys will have to replace it with the Master Robes in game and wear them that way. Sorry for the inconvenience I am working on it :) 

YOU NEED TO REPLACE THIS TEXTURE WITH THE MASTER ROBES IN YOUR GAME.

I ALSO ADDED AN OPTIONAL REQUESTED HAMMERFELL GARB ARMOUR AS ALTAIRS ROBE.
(SEE IMAGES ^^^) (The images with the Altair belt buckle)

*REPLACER ARMOUR 
*MALES ONLY

P.S I am currently working on a female work of this type, based on Altair\'s Robe and Ezio\'s ACII Vanilla Robe mashed together, to create a Feamle Assassins Creed Armour based on the two main protagonists of Assassin\'s Creed. Anyone interested, keep checking my mod page (Olaffsen) for it. 

Thank you,  

Olaf.
author: Olaffsen

files.name: Optional Requested Hammerfell Garb Altair Armour
